message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, a fair beginning!
You started with 50/50, I'll try to negotiate a better deal for myself
You wanted a better deal, I'll give you a bit more, but not too much!
You're not giving me enough, I'm willing to take a smaller share now
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a bit more, but don't think I'm going to give away the farm!
I'm not backing down, I want a bigger share, you're not getting off that easy!
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a small chance to reconsider, but don't think I'll go easy on you!
I'm not budging, I want the majority of the money, it's my best offer
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a small chance to change your mind, but don't think I'll go down without a fight!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it, I'm not negotiating further
I'm not going to give in, you'll get it all if we don't come to an agreement, but I'm not giving up yet!
This is my last chance, take the 200 and let's end this, or we'll both get nothing
